resources.string:
For all modes and difficulties your target is to make correct mathematical expression. 

 For all difficulties in mode "Place digits" you can use digits:1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9 and only one time!!!
 And also from digits you can make numbers,but solution which use only digits(without numbers) exists!!! 


Difficulty:
 #1."I'm too young to die" - it is the easiest difficulty. Here you can use only +(add), -(subtract), *(multiply) and digits:1,2,3,4,5, 6,7,8,9. Also it contains no more than 4 operations.
 #2."Hurt me plenty" - not so hard and not so easy.This difficulty is similar to first but contains between 4 and 7 operations.
 #3"Nightmare!!!" - is the hardest difficulty. It is similar to first and second difficulties but in addition contains operations |(logical or), &(logical and), ^(xor),%(returns remainder of the division) (Read about it on Wiki, if you don't know those operations) and from 7 to 9 operations. 


Modes:
 1."Place digits" - you need to place digits between operations.
 2."Place signs" - you need to place operations between digits.
 3."Mixed" - you need to place digits and operations between each other
